metadata.Title: CVE-2012-6143 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: Spoon::Cookie in the Spoon module 0.24 for Perl does not properly use the Storable::thaw function, which allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted request, which is not properly handled when it is deserialized.

criterions.comment: libspoon-perl: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
